sourcesContent:
import React,{ Fragment }  from 'react';
import {ChipField, Create, Datagrid, NumberInput, Edit, EditButton, List, ReferenceField, ReferenceManyField, SimpleForm, SingleFieldList, TextField, TextInput} from 'react-admin';
import {RightListBox} from "./comp/rightlistbox";

// in src/posts.js

/**
 *
 * creating a new role.
 *
 * @param props
 * @returns {*}
 * @constructor
 */
export const PersonCreate = props => (
    <Create {...props}>
        <SimpleForm>
            <TextField source="id" />
            <TextField source="idnumber" />
            <TextField source="surname" />
            <TextField source="givenname" />
            <TextField source="anrede" />
            <TextField source="salutation" name="salutation" />
        </SimpleForm>
    </Create>

);


/**
 *
 * showing list of the role.
 *
 * @param props
 * @returns {*}
 * @constructor
 */
export const PersonList = (props) => (
    <Fragment>
        <List {...props} title="Person">

            <Datagrid>
                <TextField source="id" />
                <TextField source="Identifikationsnummer" />
                <TextField source="surname" name="Nachname" />
                <TextField source="givenname" name="Vorname" />
                <TextField source="salutation" name="Anrede" />
            </Datagrid>
        </List>
    </Fragment>
);

/**
 *
 * editing a specified role.
 *
 * @param props
 * @returns {*}
 * @constructor
 */
export const PersonEdit = props => (
    <Edit {...props}>
        <SimpleForm >
            <TextField source="id" />
            <TextField source="idnumber" />
            <TextField source="surname" />
            <TextField source="givenname" />
            <TextField source="salutation" name="salutation" />
            <RightListBox id_role={props.id}/>
        </SimpleForm>
    </Edit>

);
